snippet: PECK--Norman. The Trustees and staff of the Parrish Art Museum mourn the loss of Norman Peck, Trustee of the Museum whose steadfast leadership, wisdom, and support shaped its modern identity. We extend our condolences to his dear wife, Liliane, his children Dominique and Ian, and his grandchildren. Frederic M. Seegal, Chair H. Peter Haveles, Jr., President, Board of Trustees 1/3
lead_paragraph: PECK--Norman. The Trustees and staff of the Parrish Art Museum mourn the loss of Norman Peck, Trustee of the Museum whose steadfast leadership, wisdom, and support shaped its modern identity. We extend our condolences to his dear wife, Liliane, his children Dominique and Ian, and his grandchildren. Frederic M. Seegal, Chair H. Peter Haveles, Jr., President, Board of Trustees 1/3
